paper.title: Portfolio optimization based on empirical mode decomposition
paper.abstract: The investigation about the cross-correlation among financial assets has drawn broad attention recently. Due to the nonlinear and non-stationary identities of the financial time series, e.g., stock return time series, the cross-correlation for different level of fluctuations are quite important for both academia and financial practitioners. Here we use the empirical mode decomposition (EMD) method to analyze the cross-correlation structure among different level of fluctuations for financial assets. The correlation based networks are then employed to determine the clustering property of stock market. We then propose several portfolio optimization strategies based on the EMD correlation-based networks. Using the topological information of the networks, we can construct some portfolios with high return and low risk. Under two portfolio evaluation frameworks, we prove that these portfolios have consistently good performance. (C) 2019 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用经验模态分解（EMD）方法和基于相关性的网络来分析金融资产之间的跨相关性，并基于此提出投资组合优化策略。论文明确提到构建具有高回报和低风险的投资组合，并评估其表现，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。
